titleStmt.title: Six speeches spoken in the Guild-Hall, London, upon Tuesday in the afternoon, Aprill 9 1644 printed in the same order they were spoken one after the other. By the Earle of Warwick, Sir Henry Vane, the Earle of Essex, the Earl of Pembroke, Colonell Hollis, and Master Recorder.
titleStmt.author: Essex, Robert Devereux, Earl of, 1591-1646.
Glynne, John, Sir, 1603-1666.
Holles, Gervase, 1606-1675.
Pembroke, Philip Herbert, Earl of, 1584-1650.
Vane, Henry, Sir, 1612?-1662.
Warwick, Robert Rich, Earl of, 1587-1658.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Richard Cotes, for Stephen Bowtell, and are to bee sold at his shop at the signe of the Bible in Popes-head-Alley,

notesStmt.note: The Right Honourable the Earle of Warwick his speech -- Sir Henry Vane his speech -- His excellency the Lord Generall his speech -- The Right Honourable the Earle of Pembrook his speech -- Collonell Hollis his speech -- Mr. Recorder his speech.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: his shop at the signe of the Bible in Popes-head-Alley
